Settings More > Teddy bear with a red bow tie What is Lucid Dreaming?
My Profile Edit
Lucid Dreaming Lucid dreaming is the fascinating phenomenon where you become aware that you are dreaming while still in the dream. This heightened state of consciousness within your dream allows you to take control, shaping the dream environment and your actions within it. Imagine flying through the sky, exploring fantastical worlds, or confronting fears in a safe, controlled space- all within the realm of your own mind. Lucid dreaming is not just an exhilarating experience, it can also be a powerful tool for personal growth, problem-solving, and creativity. By practicing techniques to achieve lucidity, you can unlock the full potential of your dreams, turning your nightly slumber into an extraordinary adventure. Techniques

Add New Dream Dream image Dream Topic: Wizarding World Dream story image
There were all 3 of them. All Harry, Hermione and Ron. I could not believe my luck when Hermione came and greeted me saying ‚ÄúHeyyy‚Äù I was totally like omg Hermione! But I acted cool like it was totally normal for me, no big deal.
Then out of nowhere Draco came along and dragged me away, he asked me what I was doing. I was confused, what was wrong with talking with Hermione? Then before I ask anything else he suddenly hugged me. I was frozen, he told me ‚ÄúI told you not to worry sweetie. She‚Äôs my ex I don‚Äôt like her anymore‚Äù OMGGGG Is he my boyfriend??????
Then I heard somebody screaming. I turned around and guess who I saw?! Umbridge!! Yuck. Looking as ugly as ever. She smiled in a cruel way and looked me up and down. I looked to my left and Draco wasn‚Äôt there! Instead there was Cedric! Like whaaat‚Ä¶
Then I heard somebody screaming again. And I WOKE UP! Ugh. It was my stupid sister watching her stupid TV programme. Anyway, this was one of the best dreams I‚Äôve ever had.
